text:
<optional title, max 6 words>

<setup: hospital room, two men, casual mood>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Zossimov: “Very good… Going on all right.”  

Razumihin: “What can he eat?”  
Zossimov: “Anything but meat, mushrooms, cucumbers.”  

---
<setup: Yusupov garden, hopeful mood>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Razumihin: “Tomorrow evening, I’ll take him for a walk.”  

Zossimov: “Maybe a little, but we’ll see.”  
Razumihin: “I have a housewarming party tonight!”  

---
<setup: cozy gathering, friendly atmosphere>
<optional narration, ≤ 6 words>
Razumihin: “Tea, vodka, herrings, and a pie!”  

Zossimov: “Who’s coming?”  
Razumihin: “Neighbors, old friends, and my uncle.”

**PAGE SUMMARY:** Zossimov monitors a patient's condition while discussing plans for a house-warming party with Razumihin.
